description:
Reunited with the yokai he and Ashiya exorcised together, Abeno realizes the Mononokean still needs Ashiya. Abeno suddenly misses him, and with the help of the yokai, he decides to give his idea a try.
Meanwhile, Ashiya wonders if the reason Abeno has been absent from school so much is because he`s busy exorcising yokai and decides to check out the shrine in the mountains Yahiko mentioned.
Source: crunchyroll
